title: Emotional Intelligence Development: Game-Based Project Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical problem-solving skills and collaborative experience
context.additional_context: Process developing emotional regulation and interpersonal skills through role-playing games utilizing math curriculum content

learning_goals: Learners can recognize their emotions in game-based conflict situations and select situationally appropriate response strategies with over 80% accuracy
Learners can observe peers' emotional states during team projects and provide proactive empathetic feedback at least 3 times
Learners can measure their emotional management development using a 3-level evaluation scale through reflective journaling after game-based activities
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
